Package com.avrix.ui.widgets

Class ComboBoxWidget.ComboPopupButton

java.lang.Object
com.avrix.ui.widgets.Widget
com.avrix.ui.widgets.PanelWidget
com.avrix.ui.widgets.ButtonWidget
com.avrix.ui.widgets.ComboBoxWidget.ComboPopupButton
Enclosing class:
ComboBoxWidget
protected class ComboBoxWidget.ComboPopupButton extends ButtonWidget
The ComboPopupButton class represents a button within the dropdown popup menu of a ComboBoxWidget. It extends the ButtonWidget class and includes additional state information such as whether the button is selected.

  • Constructor Details

    • ComboPopupButton

      public ComboPopupButton(String text, int x, int y, int width, int height, int borderRadius, NanoColor backgroundColor, Runnable onClickMethod)
      Constructs a new ButtonWidget with the specified text, position, size, border radius, and background color.
      Parameters:
      text - text displayed on the button
      x - the X-coordinate of the Widget's position
      y - the Y-coordinate of the Widget's position
      width - the width of the widget
      height - the height of the widget
      borderRadius - the radius of the corner rounding in pixels
      backgroundColor - the background color of the widget, specified in NanoColor
      onClickMethod - method that is called when the button is clicked

  • Method Details

    • isSelected

      public final boolean isSelected()
      Checks if the popup button is currently selected.
      Returns:
      true if the button is selected, false otherwise

    • setSelected

      public final void setSelected(boolean selected)
      Sets the selected state of the popup button.
      Parameters:
      selected - the new selected state of the button
